name: Mike Goulian Aviation
about: Mike Goulian Aviation is a premier flying school and Cirrus Aircraft Platinum Partner, dedicated to excellence in flight training and aircraft management. Founded by Michael and Karin Goulian, the school leverages over 30 years of experience in the aviation industry and Michael's renowned career as an aerobatic pilot and Red Bull Air Race competitor. Our training programs utilize Cirrus learning materials and are led by Cirrus Standardized Instructor Pilots (CSIPs), ensuring thorough, efficient, and safe flight training. We offer private pilot, instrument, and transition training in Cirrus SR-20 aircraft, as well as comprehensive aircraft management services. Our commitment to passion, excellence, and integrity sets us apart, making Mike Goulian Aviation a trusted home for Cirrus pilots and owners. We are dedicated to providing unmatched care and exceeding the highest standards in general aviation.
